duties_responsibilities.duty: Triage patients in accordance with hospital policy and procedure.
Assess patient condition and initiate nursing and/or medical care in accordance with established guidelines.
Develop, implement, and evaluate a plan of care based upon the assessment of the patient and document accurately in the medical record.
Engage in patient/family teaching, as appropriate.
Act as a liaison between members of the health care team, patient, and patient’s family, exemplifying the customer service standards.
Administer medications, perform diagnostic and/or therapeutic procedures and treatments in accordance with hospital policies and procedures.
Maintain equipment, supplies, and environmental safety.
Maintain professional standards and knowledge of current trends in nursing by participation in meetings and attendance at mandatory in-services.
Float to other units as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Graduate from an accredited school of nursing. Preferred - Pediatric Life Support course within 1-2 years of hire.
